# Humboldt's Cabinet Sales Offer Page - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a modern sales offer page for Humboldt's Cabinet featuring a responsive design with hero section, features, pricing tiers, testimonials, and email signup.

## Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements - Modern sales offer page with HTML/CSS/JS

- [x] Scaffold the Project - Created index.html, css/styles.css, js/main.js, and README.md

- [x] Customize the Project - Tailored content for Humboldt's Cabinet brand

- [x] Install Required Extensions - Not required for static HTML project

- [x] Compile the Project - No compilation needed for static site

- [x] Create and Run Task - Ready to open in browser or use Live Server

- [x] Launch the Project - Open index.html in browser or use Live Server extension

- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete - README.md created with full instructions
